Ko: 이 게임은 주어진 퀘스트를 클리어하거나 몬스터를 토벌하여 포인트를 획득하여 랭킹에 등록하는 게임입니다. 맵 밖으로 나가면 떨어져 죽을 수 있다는 점에 유의하세요
En: This game is to register in the rankings by earning points by clearing the given quest or catching monsters. Please note that if you go out of the map, you will fall down and die
Use these keys to move your character.

Ko: 전방으로 대쉬하는 키 입니다. 공격용으로도 사용할 수 있습니다
En: Dash forward. If you collide with a monster during dash, it takes damage.
Left Click – Perform a normal attack.\n Q – Activate Skill 1.\n E – Activate Skill 2.

Ko: 필살기 키 입니다. 에너지가 전부 채워지면 사용할 수 있습니다.
En: Use your Ultimate skill. (Can only be used when energy is full)

Ko: Alt 키를 누르고 있으면 마우스 커서가 활성화 됩니다.
En: Alt + Left Click (Hold) – Unlock the mouse. (The mouse is always active while UI is open)

Ko: 해당 숫자키를 입력하시면 각각 슬롯에 담겨 있는 아이템을 사용할 수 있습니다.
En: Use the item registered in each quick slot.

Ko: 해당키를 입력 하시면 해당되는 메뉴를 활성화 합니다.
한 대도 맞지 않고 스테이지1을 클리어하세요.
En: Clear Stage1 without taking any damage
Clear Stage1 without using any potions

Ko: 한 대도 맞지 않고 스테이지2를 클리어하세요.
En: Clear Stage2 without taking any damage
Clear Stage2 without using any potions

Ko: 한 대도 맞지 않고 스테이지3을 클리어하세요.
En: Clear Stage3 without taking any damage
Clear Stage3 without using any potions

Ko: 한 대도 맞지 않고 스테이지4를 클리어하세요
En: Clear Stage4 without taking any damage
Clear Stage4 without using any potions
"Unleashes a powerful strike forward and then gains an Attack Power buff."
"Unleashes a powerful strike forward and then gains an Attack Power buff."
"Charges forward and striking all enemies in the path."
"Charges forward and striking all enemies in the path."
"Charges forward and striking all enemies in the path and then gains a Movement Speed buff."
"Charges forward and striking all enemies in the path and then gains a Movement Speed buff."

"Deals 3 damage to all nearby enemies around the user."
"Deals 4 damage to all nearby enemies around the user."
Creates two slashes that each strike enemies within a certain range three times. After the skill ends the user gains an Attack Power buff for a short duration.
Creates two slashes that each strike enemies within a certain range three times. After the skill ends the user gains an Attack Power buff for a short duration.
Creates three slashes that each strike enemies within a certain range three times. After the skill ends the user gains an Attack Power buff for a short duration.
Creates three slashes that each strike enemies within a certain range three times. After the skill ends the user gains an Attack Power buff for a short duration.
They attack the surrounding enemies in a circle around the user
Hit the enemy around the user with a powerful attack of four times
Hit a huge sword at the user's location and attack the surrounding enemy
